Text.Language: Twbh m~P[oic e~h~r/i e~jwn: nimenra] m~p~ouro P,#c#: Ierebekka nem necs/ri: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O beloved of Christ the king, Rebecca and her children, that He may forgive us our sins.
